settings.subtitle: Why Choose Appointly
settings.title: Built for Modern Service Businesses
settings.description:
We help restaurants, salons, spas, fitness studios, and service providers streamline their booking process with beautiful, easy-to-use websites that convert visitors into confirmed appointments.

Our platform is designed specifically for European businesses, with multi-language support, GDPR compliance, and local payment methods.

settings.subtitle: Testimonials
settings.title: What Our Clients Say
settings.description: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what real businesses say about Appointly.

settings.question: How long does it take to set up?
settings.answer: Most booking websites are live within 14-21 days from the initial consultation. This includes design, development, testing, training, and launch. We can expedite for urgent projects.

settings.question: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.answer: We accept bank transfer, PayPal, credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex), and offer flexible payment plans for larger projects. Monthly subscriptions can be paid via automatic billing.

settings.question: Can I customize the design?
settings.answer: Absolutely! Every website is fully customized to match your brand colors, logo, fonts, and style preferences. We provide 2 design concepts and unlimited revisions until you're 100% satisfied.

settings.question: What happens after launch?
settings.answer: We provide 30 days of free post-launch support. After that, we offer ongoing maintenance plans starting at ‚Ç¨80/month including updates, backups, security monitoring, and technical support.

settings.question: Do you offer refunds?
settings.answer: Yes! We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with the service. We're confident you'll love your new booking website.

settings.question: Can I add more features later?
settings.answer: Yes! You can upgrade your plan or add individual features at any time. We'll provide a quote for any custom additions like multi-language support, custom integrations, or white-label options.

settings.question: Is my data secure and GDPR compliant?
settings.answer: Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption (SSL/TLS), secure cloud hosting, and are fully GDPR compliant. Your customer data is stored in European data centers and never shared with third parties.

settings.question: Do you provide training?
settings.answer: Yes! We provide comprehensive training via video call, plus written documentation and video tutorials. Your team will be confident managing bookings, customers, and settings within hours.
